page.title: 12LOCAL WORK AND WORKERS
page.content: Jesse Manns is a "Do it Yourself" store that first traded around 1900.It sells paint,wood,stone,tools.etc.They have roughly 100 customers per day.There is a staff of ten who work from Monday to Saturday from 9.00-5.30pm.The building itself is of wood and stone set in 3 acres of land. David Mills is an employee of Jesse Manns .He has lived in Kingsley Green all his life. He has seen many changes.Much more traffic passes Kingley Green now .People move house more often as they change their job. He thinks the pace of life is much faster now. People are less friendly. The quality of life is not as good as before even though he does not have to work so hard now.
